content.title: Our university
content.body: The Golden Cradle of education and science, the sacred karachanrak-Uzbekali Zhanibekov South Kazakhstan Pedagogical University is located in the center of Shymkent, on A. Baitursynov street. The university has been operating since 1937. For almost a century, he has achieved many successes and trained thousands of students. Graduates are currently working in Kazakhstan and abroad. Graduates of the University are very grateful to the educational institution!
